website_summaries.verdict: Mid-rise shoe that comes in fun prints and colors. A new take on an old favorite.
pros: Mid-rise gives a little extra ankle protection
Canvas easily cleaned in the washing machine
Once they're on, they stay on
cons: Can be tough to get little feet in them

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable! NOT the same as shoes purchased in-store
customer_reviews.text: I have very similar looking shoes in blue that I purchased from a Converse store. I love them and wear them often, so I purchased these in black here. They appear the same in photos, but are NOT the same. These were awful. They were uncomfortable and stiff. They rubbed badly in the heels, despite being the same size as my blue pair. I tried insoles and heel cushions and eventually just gave up and threw these out!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected but color a little off..
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits as expected. The only issue I have with it is that the red is not like the picture. The red in the picture is a deep red and very nice. However, the shoe we got was a brighter red. Lol! My son loves red but he barely wears this converse because he doesn't like the shade of red. We had to go and purchase another pair of converse at the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Living LiPkAi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip on converse
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Perfect slip ons. Classic converse style appeal. They are kids, but I'm a women's 6 and enjoy these a lot. Perfect for any lazy converse fan.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this style shoe over and over again. Easy to slip on and off. Fit slightly large, but are great for growing feet. Converse are super durable and I feel like we get great use out of these from a very busy boy.
customer_reviews.author: loveMM

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: My son is very rough on shoes, so we tried the converse since the rubber front would stop him from breaking through cloth fronts in two weeks. I am very impressed by the durability of these shoes, given how rough he is with shoes. They're still holding up well. I wish they were more athletic for him to run around in though.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan S

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! Granddaughter so happy! She has another pair that she has worn until we no longer would allow her to wear them in public because they looked so bad. She is soooooo happy to have another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: but the color grey is a nice neutral
customer_reviews.text: the opening to slip the foot into the sneaker is very tight and then the size of the length of the shoe is too long. i had to return them. but the color grey is a nice neutral
customer_reviews.author: wonder why

customer_reviews.title: Awesome same day delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product fits as it should, I am so impressed that i order this item this morning at 7am and by 7pm it already at my house. That is pretty amazing, I was able to get the item I wanted without having to wait for the delivery period. Super awesome feature on Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Cytlalli Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: But they are easy on/off and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year for my kids for school. They're typical Converse...not much support, heavy, and run a little large. But they are easy on/off and stylish. The kids like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Converse are always a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these converse as he can slip them on & off with ease. Converse always run a little big. These are authentic. Great neutral color.
customer_reviews.author: Briana V

customer_reviews.title: good buy and great for small children
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son. they were definitely a good buy and they lasted until he grew out of them. they are easy to wash and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Twaregr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look cool
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very durable. I have two boys that are two years apart and these shoes will be handed down to my younger son once the older one grows out of them. They did take a little longer to "break in" but I think it was because of the durable materials and construction of the shoes. Cool shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very nice. Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very nice. Very nice looking. I just chose the wrong size. I am confused by the "little kid, big kid" sizes
customer_reviews.author: Sancar59

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Way to big! My son wear a toddler size 8. I bought that size and it's HUGE! He may be able to wear them next year.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Super fun shoe that my kid absolutely loves. True to size and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased one size bigger as soon as he grew out of the ones before because he does not like wearing anything else
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. This is the second time I purchased them. I purchased one size bigger as soon as he grew out of the ones before because he does not like wearing anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are cute, durable and even though they appear to have laces, they are actually lace free elastic slip ons.
customer_reviews.author: sunchixi81

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are fantastic. They look great and seem to be sturdier ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fantastic. They look great and seem to be sturdier than most Chucks. Best of all, no more tying my kid's shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alassi1369

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my son they fit great and he loves them. I would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have found Converse to run a little big so I sized down 0.5 size and they fit perfectly! My son loves the "easy on/easy off" of these sneaks!
customer_reviews.author: MMAH

customer_reviews.title: A staple shoe at our house. Will continue to buy over and over
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe and great for slip on shoe can be dressed up or down. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Franz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love, love,love it !!!! It looks so very classic and timeless
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality; good fit, wears very well.. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Fit for the most part compared to most shoes I get (have small feet). The backs of the shoes are slightly uncomfortable at first but once you break them in, there great!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: I love the laces (not worried about him tripping over them) ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is not picky about much, but LOVES these shoes. They make him "super fast". I love the laces (not worried about him tripping over them) and they can take a beating and hold up well! I'm buying in multiple sizes
customer_reviews.author: AMCOLA

customer_reviews.title: I love them but gave a 4 star because they erin ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them but gave a 4 star because they erin big. Im usually a 4 4.5 in kids and these were slipping out. Returning to get smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and trendy!! Fit as expected and I would highly recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and came really fast! My son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Avid Chuck fan
customer_reviews.text: my boys love this show it's a great fit there may very well
customer_reviews.author: keya

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for a Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and looks well made. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle laces yet
customer_reviews.text: Here is a shoe that people will not make front of you for wearing. Looks great, washes great (boys=mud) and no more teasing.
customer_reviews.author: WifeMomBoss

customer_reviews.title: Best converse
customer_reviews.text: I love the no time to tie converse. Great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. This is the second pair of the exact same shoes I've purchased for him because he resists wearing anything else.
customer_reviews.author: L Golden

customer_reviews.title: They look and fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes with good support for my 9 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Baker

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old grandson loved them.
customer_reviews.text: True to size. What you see is what you get. My 11 year old grandson loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome while they lasted.
customer_reviews.text: These had fit him perfect. He grew out in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Howard

customer_reviews.title: Got what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: They're Chucks. Need I say more? Adequate packaging for transit.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Otten

customer_reviews.title: hurts
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable. Rubs the back of my heal. I now have a sore on both heals
customer_reviews.author: BellaReana

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. The junior kid size fit and looks so ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. The junior kid size fit and looks so much better than the traditional longer and flatter converse.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Pacello

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but seemed to run 1/2 size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Ayling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them for my 7 year old. Sturdy and soft at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: My son's "go to" shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are my son's 4th pair of the street slip ons. He loves them. His foot runs a little wide but after a couple of times wearing them, they conform to his feet. We will be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I've ever boughten for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I've ever boughten for my kids! First pair of shoes my kid didn't complain about being to tight or too big. Fit her perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great they are a little heavy, but are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: James D. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for my kindergarteners who is still learning to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for my kindergarteners who is still learning to tie his shoes but wants to run fast! Laces are easy no tie which slip on easily but stay on while running
customer_reviews.author: Momlove5

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoe needs more grips at the bottom of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: He loved it.. quit big but he likes it very much
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Tolosa

customer_reviews.title: Its too large... I'm returned the shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Its too large ... I'm returned the shoes and still waiting for the new size 3.5
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Gomez

product_meta.title: Converse Kids' Chuck Taylor All Star Street Mid (Infant/Toddler)
product_meta.description: Hit the street in sick style!.
